title: Business Trends & Market Analysis
desc: Analyzed 1.5M+ LA business records using Python and survival analysis techniques.
Built Kaplan–Meier, Random Survival Forest, and LSTM predictive models.
Developed an interactive Plotly Dash dashboard deployed on Google App Engine.

title: Auction & Marketplace System
desc: Designed and normalized a MySQL database schema (ERD, BCNF, indexing, triggers).
Implemented a full-stack web app with Node.js/Express backend and React frontend.
Supported product browsing, auctions, cart, order processing, and notifications.

title: Automated Food Classification
desc: Developed CNN models using transfer learning (EfficientNetB0, ResNet50).
Applied data augmentation and training optimizations on Food-101 dataset.

title: The Apathy of Kings — Card Game
desc: Developed a turn-based card game in Python.
Implemented core game logic: turn sequencing, card interactions, and state management.
